subject: Basketball
Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides
Interscholastic Athletics
organizations: Paterson Charter School for Science and Technology (Paterson, NJ)
lead_paragraph: Armoni Sexton, a rising high school basketball player, was killed, and at least three other people were wounded in a drive-by shooting in Paterson, N.J., on Saturday night.
snippet: Armoni Sexton, a rising high school basketball player, was killed, and at least three other people were wounded in a drive-by shooting in Paterson, N.J., on Saturday night.
